fear: around it, therefore, for that reason
to experience, find out, to learn, to hear
to experience, to undergo an experience
So, what are you all doing here?
What do people do here? What does one do here?
What is your name? Lit. How are you called?
This one or that one there?
See you later! Lit. until later
It's a good thing that you are here.

die Angst, die Ängste: Ich bin ich und du bist du.
fear: I am me and you are you.

die Angst, die Ängste: Wo war er? Wo ist er gewesen?
